WorkflowInfo.Name: Increase incident severity every 10 minutes
WorkflowInfo.Description: Check incident status and increase incident severity every 10 minutes
WorkflowInfo.Xoml: <SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:IncidentStatus;Assembly=IncidentStatus, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetIncidentSeverity;Assembly=GetIncidentSeverity, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ChangeSeverity;Assembly=ChangeSeverity, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:Wait;Assembly=Wait, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns0:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="5" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns1:IncidentStatus IncidentNumber="-1" isCurrent="True" DeviceVariable="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ClassificationVariable="" isDefault="1" IsValid="True" DisplayName="Get Incident Status" Number="-1" x:Name="incidentStatus1" Description="Check incident status" TypeName="IncidentStatus" Type="0" Classification="-1" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="True" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,True)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns3:GetIncidentSeverity x:Name="getIncidentSeverity1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" DisplayName="Get Incident Severity" Description="Returns the severity of the current incident or the current instance." ChosenIncident="Current instance severity" TypeName="GetIncidentSeverity" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity2"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity3"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="Critical" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals("&&&","Critical")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns0:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="0" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity4"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="Default Branch" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="{x:Null}" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="0" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns4:ChangeSeverity DeviceVariable="" SeverityNumber="-1" DisplayName="Change Severity" IsValid="True" Number="-1" Type="0" Classification="-1" SeverityName="" isDefault="1" isCurrent="True" x:Name="changeSeverity1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Change the severity of an incident." ClassificationVariable="" IncidentNumber="-1" TypeName="ChangeSeverity" /> <ns5:Wait IsValid="True" x:Name="wait1" TimeInterval="" isDefault="0" DisplayName="Wait" TimeInSeconds="600" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Pause workflow" TypeName="Wait" TimeValue="" Timeout="00:10:00" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="False" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,False)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns0:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="0" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
